# Setup

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(scales)
library(extrafont)
library(glue)
library(patchwork)
library(ggtext)
library(ggbump)
```

```{r my.theme, include=TRUE}
my.theme <- theme(
  plot.title = element_text(color="black", face="bold", size=24, hjust=0), 
  plot.subtitle = element_text(color="black", size=12, hjust=0), 
  axis.title = element_text(color="black", face="bold", size=12), 
  axis.text = element_text(color="black", size=14), 
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  plot.caption = element_text(color="black", size=12), 
  panel.background =  element_blank(), 
  panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "grey90", size = 0.5),
  panel.grid.minor = element_line(colour = "grey93", size = 0.5),
  panel.border = element_blank(), 
  legend.title=element_blank(), 
  legend.text = element_text(color="black", size=12, hjust=0),
  legend.position = 'top',
  strip.text = element_text(color="black", size=14))
```

```{r read_data, include=TRUE}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2019, week = 38)

df <- tuesdata$national_parks
```

```{r df_summary, include=TRUE}
df %>% 
  summary()
```

# EDA  



```{r plot_, fig.height=6.2}
df %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(annual_visitor_rank = as.integer(rank(-visitors))) %>% 
  select(annual_visitor_rank, year, unit_name, visitors, everything()) %>% 
  arrange(year, annual_visitor_rank) %>% 
  filter(annual_visitor_rank <= 10) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  distinct(unit_name)
#should choose when to start this
```
